chunk:
Luma & Leaf Relief & Repair Moisturizer

Brand: Luma & Leaf

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, CANDELILLA/JOJOBA/RICE BRAN POLYGLYCERYL-3 ESTERS, ROSA CANINA (ROSEHIP) SEED OIL, CANNABIS SATIVA (HEMP) SEED OIL, GLYCERIN, JOJOBA ESTERS, GLYCERYL S

A ESTERS, GLYCERYL STEARATE, SODIUM LEVULINATE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED WAX, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, NIACINAMIDE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM STEAROYL LACTYLATE, AVENA SATIVA (WILD OAT) KERNEL OIL, LYSOLECITHIN, SCLEROTIUM GUM, SODIUM PHYTATE, ACACIA DECURRENS FLOWER WAX, POLYGLYCERIN-3, PULLULAN, XANTHAN GUM, SILICA

Ingredie

UM, SILICA

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
